DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Study Ivivi SofPulse Pain Amelioration Adults With Mild Moderate Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , double-blind , randomize , sham-controlled clinical trial investigate effectiveness PRF use Ivivi SofPulse knee pain severity adult mild moderate knee OA . Potential subject complete question related medical history , inclusion / exclusion criterion , OA symptom severity . Knee radiograph evaluate Principal Investigator ( PI ) co-investigator determination knee OA severity base Kellgren/Lawrence criterion . Eligible subject enter 1-week run-in period . After successful completion run-in period , subject randomize PRF treatment twice day ( Active ) sham treatment twice day ( Sham ) . All subject follow 4 week purpose primary endpoint evaluation . Thereafter , subject initially allocate Active equally allocate Active Sham follow 26 8 week , respectively . The subject originally assign Sham maintain treatment regimen 26 week .
